column4: it's easy to understand why people don't go with something other then windows because I can't even get a monitor to work correctly
what do I have to do to get my monitor to work
It knows my video card and it knows what kind of monitor it is
but I can't change the resolution
well I want to know why I can't go into display and fix the resolution size
you should then do what it says
you still need to edit xorg.conf it doesn't work correctly
well it's not fine or it would work. did you specify HorizSync and VertRefresh to the values your monitor manual lists?
